name: 3DFPS (AlyaDazzle)
description: The game was created according to the courses of the University of Michigan.I made a new terrain in two levels. added more new objects, plus changed the transition to the second level, now in order to go through the portal at level 1, you also need to collect mushrooms. At the second level, I would like the second character to take the mushrooms and take them to the queen and talk to the player, but I did not have time, unfortunately, to do it.I made a new landscape in two levels. added more new objects, plus changed the transition to the second level, now in order to go through the portal at level 1, you also need to collect mushrooms.
